pr_title: [NETBEANS-2644] Gradle buildSrc projects are recognized and displayed in the Build Scripts node

timeline.message: [NETBEANS-2644] Gradle buildSrc projects are recognized and displayed in the Build Scripts node

timeline.author: hectorespert
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -335,6 +335,7 @@ matrix:
             - ant $OPTS build
           script:
             - ant $OPTS -f extide/o.apache.tools.ant.module test
+            - ant $OPTS -f extide/gradle test

replies.bodyText: Well I finally I had to remove this one, as it seems we have a circular cluster dependency on tests, so it fails. I need to fix that in a different PR. But definitely thanks for pointing this out!
replies.author: lkishalmi
